name: Hungarian voxel game
description:
Sooo i am going to make a video to my YouTube channel (Bence Turi).

Someone give me an idea and i make it as a game or an app, and i am going to release it on itch. Yeah. This is a Voxel game, and definitely not a Minecraft copy.

*Laugh*

Soo yes.

Controls:

WASD + Space

Change blocks with left and right arrows

Pause: Escape

Crouch: Shift
